column1: '''Sandra Scholes''' is a British freelance artist who has illustrated for several fantasy magazines and book publishers since 1994. Lightspeed and Eclipse are but to name a few. Along the way she has illustrated a plaque for her local museum
column2: caricatures for a gaming fanclub and a logo for skydiving enthusiasts' clothing
column3: as well as providing artwork for the [[Amon Hen (journal)|Amon Hen journal]].

column1: She also has her work published on the internet
column2: and is currently completing the mammoth task of a canvas painting of Tolkien-esque proportions.
